trans-unit.source: The list of banned symbols contains a duplicate.
trans-unit.target: Yasaklanan semboller listesi yinelenen bir öğe içeriyor.

trans-unit.source: The symbol '{0}' is listed multiple times in the list of banned APIs
trans-unit.target: '{0}' sembolü yasaklanan API'ler listesinde birden çok kez listelenmiş

trans-unit.source: The list of banned symbols contains a duplicate
trans-unit.target: Yasaklanan semboller listesi yinelenen bir öğe içeriyor

trans-unit.source: RestrictedInternalsVisibleToAttribute enables a restricted version of InternalsVisibleToAttribute to limit access to internal symbols only within specified namespaces. Each referencing assembly is only allowed to access internal symbols within the restricted namespaces that the referenced assembly allows.
trans-unit.target: RestrictedInternalsVisibleToAttribute enables a restricted version of InternalsVisibleToAttribute to limit access to internal symbols only within specified namespaces. Each referencing assembly is only allowed to access internal symbols within the restricted namespaces that the referenced assembly allows.

trans-unit.source: External access to internal symbol '{0}' is prohibited. Assembly '{1}' only allows access to internal symbols defined in following namespace(s): '{2}'
trans-unit.target: External access to internal symbol '{0}' is prohibited. Assembly '{1}' only allows access to internal symbols defined in following namespace(s): '{2}'

trans-unit.source: External access is prohibited to internal symbols outside the restricted namespace(s)
trans-unit.target: External access is prohibited to internal symbols outside the restricted namespace(s)

trans-unit.source: The symbol has been marked as banned in this project, and an alternate should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: Sembol bu projede yasaklanan olarak işaretlendiğinden bunun yerine başka bir sembol kullanılması gerekiyor.

trans-unit.source: The symbol '{0}' is banned in this project{1}
